SageTVPlugin.Name: Google Weather
SageTVPlugin.Description: A weather support library that is used by SageTV's updated weather system to retrieve weather information from OpenWeather.
SageTVPlugin.Author: Opus4, jusjoken
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes:
Updated public release.
Version 3.0.1: Updated to use OpenWeatherMap as weather source. Uses the weather icons and moon icons from Gemstone/WIcons plugins Radar removed at least for now until it can be reviewed for a proper replacement
Version 2.0.3: Fixed Radar parameters to include the map image as the background behind radar image.
Version 2.0.2: Updated the list of possible condition icons.
Version 2.0.1: Changed default icon set. Check for Not Available data and substitute with appropriate N/A value. Added call to retrieve text used to indicate Not Available. Added call to get a unique ID for the current set of alerts. If the ID changes, then the alerts changed. Added local weather stations to search results list when available.
Version 2.0.0: This is an updated release to change the weather data source to Weather Underground. To restore weather in the default STV for SageTV v7.1.9, get the updated STV via Setup -> Detailed Setup -> Advanced -> Check for STV Update. The weather data is updated no more often than every 30 minutes.
